title: No Retreat, No Surrender
plot: Ο δεκαεφτάχρονος γιος ενός δασκάλου καράτε αποφασίζει να εκδικηθεί ένα τραστ σχολών καράτε, που κάποτε κτύπησαν τον πατέρα του και του πήραν τη σχολή που διεύθυνε στο Λος Αντζελες.

title: A Crime
plot: Vincent's life is on hold until he finds his wife's killer. Alice, his neighbor, is convinced she can make him happy. She decides to invent a culprit, so that Vincent can find revenge and leave the past behind. But there is no ideal culprit and no perfect crime.

title: The Morning After
plot: A washed up, alcoholic actress who is prone to blackouts wakes up next to a murdered man. Did she kill him and, if not, is she in danger?

title: Face/Off
plot: In order to foil a terrorist plot, an FBI agent undergoes facial transplant surgery and assumes the identity of a criminal mastermind, who murdered his only son. The plan turns sour when the criminal wakes up prematurely and seeks revenge.

title: Desert Saints
plot: An American assassin, who works for cartels in Latin America, is back in USA. He gets a woman before each job and kills her after. FBI's on to him but are curious about his next big job.

title: Hachi: A Dog's Tale
plot: A college professor bonds with an abandoned dog he takes into his home.

title: Devil's Gate
plot: Seeking a missing woman in North Dakota, an FBI agent and a sheriff focus on her religious zealot husband but discover something far more sinister.
A naive young man assumes a dead man's identity and finds himself embroiled in an underground world of power, violence, and chance where men gamble behind closed doors on the lives of other men.

title: High School
plot: A high school valedictorian who gets baked with the local stoner finds himself the subject of a drug test. The situation causes him to concoct an ambitious plan to get his entire graduating class to face the same fate, and fail.

title: Leningrad
plot: When in 1941 Nazi Germany invaded the Soviet Union, their troops quickly besieged Leningrad. Foreign journalists are evacuated but one of them, Kate Davies, is presumed dead and misses the ...

title: Ice
plot: A diamond dealer navigates the culturally diverse and otherwise treacherous world of the diamond business.

title: Phenomenon
plot: An ordinary man sees a bright light descend from the sky, and discovers he now has super-intelligence and telekinesis.

title: Home Run
plot: A pro ball player with a substance abuse problem is forced into rehab in his hometown, finding new hope when he gets honest about his checkered past, and takes on coaching duties for a misfit Little League team.

title: The Crow
plot: A man brutally murdered comes back to life as an undead avenger of his and his fiancée's murder.

title: Heat
plot: A group of professional bank robbers start to feel the heat from police when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.

title: Ip Man
plot: During the Japanese invasion of 1937, when a wealthy martial artist is forced to leave his home and work to support his family, he reluctantly agrees to train others in the art of Wing Chun for self-defense.

title: A Fistful of Dollars
plot: A wandering gunfighter plays two rival families against each other in a town torn apart by greed, pride, and revenge.

title: King Solomon's Mines
plot: An adventurous quest for a treasure hidden in King Solomon's mines, based on H. Rider Haggard's timeless tale.

title: Storm of the Century
plot: A dangerous blizzard hits an isolated town and brings along a mysterious stranger intent on terrorizing people for his own desires.

title: The Prison
plot: A troubled ex-cop imprisoned for a hit-and-run accident discovers that the entire penitentiary is controlled by an inmate who has been running a crime syndicate with the help of the warden and guards which provides them 100% alibi.

title: The Mist
plot: A freak storm unleashes a species of bloodthirsty creatures on a small town, where a small band of citizens hole up in a supermarket and fight for their lives.

title: As Far as My Feet Will Carry Me
plot: At the end of WW2, a German POW doing hard labor in the Soviet Gulag escapes from his Siberian camp to return to Germany but he's pursued by a Soviet NKVD officer.

title: The Island
plot: Somewhere in Northern Russia in a small Russian Orthodox monastery lives an unusual man whose bizarre conduct confuses his fellow monks, while others who visit the island believe that the man has the power to heal, exorcise demons and foretell the future.

title: Deep Impact
plot: A comet is discovered to be on a collision course with Earth. As doomsday nears, the human race prepare for the worst.

title: Έτερος εγώ
plot: A professor of criminology tries to solve five completely unrelated murders whose only link is quotes from Pythagoras. Alongside him on this journey is a maths professor.

title: Crash
plot: Los Angeles citizens with vastly separate lives collide in interweaving stories of race, loss and redemption.

title: The Butterfly Effect
plot: Evan Treborn suffers blackouts during significant events of his life. As he grows up, he finds a way to remember these lost memories and a supernatural way to alter his life by reading his journal.

title: The Gentlemen
plot: An American expat tries to sell off his highly profitable marijuana empire in London, triggering plots, schemes, bribery and blackmail in an attempt to steal his domain out from under him.

title: Tomboy
plot: A family moves into a new neighborhood, and a 10-year-old named Laure deliberately presents as a boy named Mikhael to the neighborhood children.

title: Little Women
plot: Jo March reflects back and forth on her life, telling the beloved story of the March sisters - four young women each determined to live life on their own terms.

title: Dark Waters
plot: A corporate defense attorney takes on an environmental lawsuit against a chemical company that exposes a lengthy history of pollution.

title: A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood
plot: Based on the true story of a real-life friendship between Fred Rogers and journalist Lloyd Vogel.

title: Queen & Slim
plot: A couple's first date takes an unexpected turn when a police officer pulls them over.

title: Green Book
plot: A working-class Italian-American bouncer becomes the driver of an African-American classical pianist on a tour of venues through the 1960s American South.

title: Ford v Ferrari
plot: American car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles battle corporate interference and the laws of physics to build a revolutionary race car for Ford in order to defeat Ferrari at the 24 Hours of Le Mans in 1966.

title: Dolittle
plot: A physician who can talk to animals embarks on an adventure to find a legendary island with a young apprentice and a crew of strange pets.

title: Jojo Rabbit
plot: A young boy in Hitler's army finds out his mother is hiding a Jewish girl in their home.

title: Midway
plot: The story of the Battle of Midway, told by the leaders and the sailors who fought it.

title: Superman: Red Son
plot: What if baby Kal-El's rocket landed, not in Kansas, but in the Soviet Union? That is the premise of this Elseworld's tale from DC Comics.

title: Knives Out
plot: A detective investigates the death of a patriarch of an eccentric, combative family.

title: Parasite
plot: A poor family, the Kims, con their way into becoming the servants of a rich family, the Parks. But their easy life gets complicated when their deception is threatened with exposure.

title: The Invisible Man
plot: When Cecilia's abusive ex takes his own life and leaves her his fortune, she suspects his death was a hoax. As a series of coincidences turn lethal, Cecilia works to prove that she is being hunted by someone nobody can see.

title: Sonic the Hedgehog
plot: After discovering a small, blue, fast hedgehog, a small-town police officer must help it defeat an evil genius who wants to do experiments on it.

title: The Grudge
plot: A house is cursed by a vengeful ghost that dooms those who enter it with a violent death.

April 6th, 1917. As a regiment assembles to wage war deep in enemy territory, two soldiers are assigned to race against time and deliver a message that will stop 1,600 men from walking straight into a deadly trap.

title: Escape from Pretoria
plot: Based on the real-life prison break of two political captives, Escape From Pretoria is a race-against-time thriller set in the tumultuous apartheid days of South Africa.

title: Richard Jewell
plot: American security guard Richard Jewell saves thousands of lives from an exploding bomb at the 1996 Olympics, but is vilified by journalists and the press who falsely reported that he was a terrorist.

title: Black Widow
plot: A film about Natasha Romanoff in her quests between the films Civil War and Infinity War.

title: Birds of Prey: And the Fantabulous Emancipation of One Harley Quinn
plot: After splitting with the Joker, Harley Quinn joins superheroes Black Canary, Huntress and Renee Montoya to save a young girl from an evil crime lord.

title: Avengers: Infinity War
plot: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

title: Avengers: Endgame
plot: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: Interstellar
plot: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Matrix
plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.
